description:
We want to remind our players that Bejeweled is compatible with iOS versions 5.1.1 to iOS Version 7.1, and with the following devices: iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch.

Discover all-new ways to play the world’s #1 puzzle game – for free! You’ll find your perfect match with 6 breathtaking modes, from the cascades of fun in Classic to the fast-paced, time-based Lightning, and the new Poker Mode where you’ll make Pairs, Flushes, Full Houses and more! Create electrifying special gems like Flame gems, Star gems, Hypercubes and Supernova gems,  collect flashy Bejeweled badges and achievements and soar to dazzling heights in the Game Center leaderboards!  All while enjoying fantastic Retina display graphics.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings. See http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4213 for more info.

 “Bejeweled — perhaps the most insanely addictive puzzle game ever.” — Games Magazine

GAME MODES AND FEATURES

ARE YOU FAST AS LIGHTNING?
Test your gem-swapping ability in a race against time.

CLASSIC GEM-MATCHING FUN
Play the most popular puzzle game of the century with powerful new gems.

DIG INTO DIAMOND MINE
Blast gems to collect gold, diamonds and buried artifacts before the clock runs out.

RELAX IN ZEN MODE
Customize sights and sounds to create your own relaxing retreat.

SAVE THE BUTTERFLIES!
Match gems to free the butterflies before they move up the board where a hungry spider awaits!

GO ALL-IN WITH POKER
Make poker hands with gem matches, including Pairs, 3 of a Kind, Full House, 4 of a Kind, Flushes and more!

PROVE YOUR GEM-MATCHING PROWESS
Earn flashy Bejeweled badges and Game Center achievements to prove your multifaceted skills!

CLIMB THE WORLD RANKS
Compete against the world and your friends in Game Center leaderboards for the top score!

HINTS ON DEMAND 
Can't quite spot the next match? Use the "Hint" button for a quick tip.

STATS GALORE
Gloat over your scores for total matched gems, all-time best moves and top 10 personal bests in Classic and Diamond Mine!

PLEASE NOTE: Bejeweled has ultra-awesome graphics, so you’ll need a 3rd generation (16GB or more) or later iPod touch, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4/4S to play or iPad 3 or above. Please make sure your device is compatible prior to download.

Blitz mode will open a separate, free Bejeweled Blitz App.

This app contains direct links to the Internet that can take players away from the game with the ability to browse any Web page.

***EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.

Important Consumer Information: This App: Contains advertisements for EA and its partners; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates; contains direct links to social networking sites intended for an audience over 13; contains direct links to the Internet.

©2014 Electronic Arts Inc. Bejeweled and PopCap are trademarks of Electronic Arts Inc.
releaseNotes:
Hello Bejeweled Fans! In our continuous pursuit to improve your experience, we’ve updated the game to include full support for iOS 8.
 
Thank you for your ongoing support. As always, please let us know what you think of the game and rate us after each update.
